contents: Article 18 (Verification of evaluation) ① Evaluation is based on written evaluation, but in principle, interviews and on-site inspections are conducted simultaneously for verification. ② When an organization subject to evaluation submits a report, the head of the organization must sign and seal the confirmation form to reaffirm the burden of proof for lies and errors in the performance submission. Revised 2020. 11. 5. ③ Deleted 2018. 2. 5. ④ In principle, if false or serious errors are confirmed among the data submitted by the evaluation target organization, the relevant indicator is treated as ‘0 points’. Revised 2020. 11. 5.
